ygData.subject: Re: Monks
ygData.msgSnippet: There s also the fact that they can heal a bubble every few minutes. MUCH less downtime than a warrior when going solo. Besides, it s just fun to watch them
ygData.messageBody:
There's also the fact that they can heal a bubble
every few minutes. MUCH less downtime than a warrior
when going solo. Besides, it's just fun to watch them
fight.<br>On the "Well rounded" stats though, i've never had
problems with them. As spellcasters they may not get quite
as much mana as, for example, Erudites or High
Elves, but they can take hits better. And no finger
waggler can hide behind a tank forever. And as warriors
they may not do the raw damage ogres do, but they
learn skills, including combat skills easier, get
better prices, etc.<br>That, and some people just want
to ROLE-PLAY a human. Or an Ogre. Or a wizzie. Or
anything else.<br>This is a role-playing game after all,
people. One that's a lot more interactive than most
computer R.P.G's. So find a class/race you want to
role-play, and have fun with it. ^-^
